nodes.text: R4-H5 was an R4-series astromech droid used by Jedi Master Kit Fisto in his Delta-7 Jedi starfighter. R4-H5 had a dome painted a red-orange with a body that was green and yellow-green in color.
R4-H5 served as Kit Fisto's Astromech droid during the First Battle of Geonosis.
R4-H5 lacks the R4-series's trademark conical head dome, similar to R4-P17, the droid used by Obi-Wan Kenobi in his Delta-7. The Jedi modified many of their R4 units to have R2 series domes.
Coincidentally enough, R4-H5 shares the "H5" with Kit Fisto's other droid, R6-H5.
In 2008 Hasbro made a figure of R4-H5 as part of their Build-a-Droid series, offered exclusive to Wal-Mart.
